title: Fire crab
data:

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| Attack2                                                                         | 15 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [fire](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour")) |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A variety of crab prized for its brilliantly jewelled shell. The rarity of the shells is only enhanced by its vicious, fiery nature, and its almost supernatural ability to expel massive quantities of flames.***“The planet brought forth scintillating jewelled scuttling crabs, which \[they] ate, smashing their shells with iron mallets; tall aspiring trees with breathtaking slenderness and colour which \[they] cut down and burned the crab meat with.” -Douglas Adams, The Hitch-hiker’s Guide to the Galaxy |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Fire crabs** are fairly durable crustaceans with fiery melee attacks and the ability to flood their surroundings with [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") of flame. Fortunately, they are only found in the deeper sections of [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"), [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"), and [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"). You can also find them in a volcano-themed [Lair](/Lair "Lair") end-vault and in actual [volcanoes](/Volcano "Volcano"), wading through lava.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                       |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Flaming Cloud](/Flaming_Cloud "Flaming Cloud") (d12) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") can significantly reduce their damage output.
- Don't expect running away to do you much good. Even if you can escape the clouds in a step, they'll be likely to blast you with new clouds. Kill them quick to take the fire out at the source!
- They have moderately low willpower. [Wands](/Wand "Wand") can work at disabling them, though it may take a few tries.
- They are vulnerable to [poison](/Poison "Poison"), so poison in general is effective. Waiting for poison to tick down can be dangerous without rF+, however.

## History

- Fire crabs can travel through [lava](/Lava "Lava") since [0.31](/0.31 "0.31").
html:
Fire crab

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

fire crab t 
HP 34-70
HD 8
XP 779
Speed 10
AC 9
EV 6
Will 40
Attack1 15 (bite: fire)
Attack2 15 (claw: fire)


Resistances rF+++
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Amphibious lava
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type crab, fire crab
Flags No skeleton
A variety of crab prized for its brilliantly jewelled shell. The rarity of the shells is only enhanced by its vicious, fiery nature, and its almost supernatural ability to expel massive quantities of flames.

“The planet brought forth scintillating jewelled scuttling crabs, which [they] ate, smashing their shells with iron mallets; tall aspiring trees with breathtaking slenderness and colour which [they] cut down and burned the crab meat with.”
-Douglas Adams, The Hitch-hiker’s Guide to the Galaxy

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Fire crabs are fairly durable crustaceans with fiery melee attacks and the ability to flood their surroundings with clouds of flame. Fortunately, they are only found in the deeper sections of the Dungeon, the Depths, and the Vaults. You can also find them in a volcano-themed Lair end-vault and in actual volcanoes, wading through lava.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Flaming Cloud (d12) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Fire resistance can significantly reduce their damage output.
  • Don't expect running away to do you much good. Even if you can escape the clouds in a step, they'll be likely to blast you with new clouds. Kill them quick to take the fire out at the source!
  • They have moderately low willpower. Wands can work at disabling them, though it may take a few tries.
  • They are vulnerable to poison, so poison in general is effective. Waiting for poison to tick down can be dangerous without rF+, however.

History

  • Fire crabs can travel through lava since 0.31.
